definition: weather cold enough to cause freezing, damage by frost
details:
noun
- weather cold enough to cause freezing
= synonyms: freeze
- the formation of frost or ice on a surface
= synonyms: icing
- ice crystals forming a white deposit (especially on objects outside)
= synonyms: hoar
verb
- damage by frost
= example: damage by frost
- cover with frost
= example: cover with frost
- provide with a rough or speckled surface or appearance
= example: provide with a rough or speckled surface or appearance
- decorate with frosting
= example: decorate with frosting
= synonyms: ice
